Text: Caldoche:  The term "caldoche" has a pejorative connotation.
Triplets:<Caldoche
4:
--------------------
Text: Caldoche:  Caldoches are keen to differentiate themselves from these inhabitants, underlining their position as the permanent locals, referring to them as "métros " (short for "métropolitains ") or as "Zoreilles" (informally "zozos ") in local slang.
Triplets:<Caldoche
